Client - Class in communication
Client class for TCP/IP communication for the game
Client() - Constructor for class communication.Client
Null parameter constructor Creates a client, a socket for it, connects to the default server and binds its streams.
Client(String) - Constructor for class communication.Client
Creates a client, a socket for it, connects to the specified host server and binds its streams.
Client(String, int) - Constructor for class communication.Client
Creates a client, a socket for it, connects to the specified server on the specified port and binds its streams.

Abstarct class to wrap the network services application specificly.

connect_server(String) - Static method in class communication.Communication
Connect to a server on the specified IP and default port, both the client and server receives a message to notify the user of a succesful connection

Connect to a server on the specified IP and specified port, both the client and server receives a message to notify the user of a succesful connection
